lead_paragraph: English coaches need to gain experience outside the domestic game if they are to put themselves in contention to take charge of the national side, Rugby Football Union (RFU) chief executive Ian Ritchie has said.

headline.print_headline: Rugby-English RFU Encourages Coaches to Seek Overseas Experience
headline.main: Rugby-English RFU Encourages Coaches to Seek Overseas Experience

snippet: English coaches need to gain experience outside the domestic game if they are to put themselves in contention to take charge of the national side, Rugby Football Union (RFU) chief executive Ian Ritchie has said....
